 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַבְדוֺת‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==servitude, bondage==; — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַבְדֻתֵנוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.9.8|Ezek 9:8]]; [[Ezek.9.9|Ezek 9:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַבְדֻתָם‎</span> [[Neh.9.17|Neh 9:17]] (compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">).
